metadata.title: CVE-2020-27750 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in ImageMagick in MagickCore/colorspace-private.h andMagickCore/quantum.h. An attacker who submits a crafted file that isprocessed by ImageMagick could trigger undefined behavior in the form ofvalues outside the range of type `unsigned char` and math division by zero.This would most likely lead to an impact to application availability, butcould potentially cause other problems related to undefined behavior. Thisflaw affects ImageMagick versions prior to 7.0.8-68.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
